description: Conservation area consent in connection with Part demolition, refurbishment and erection of a part one and part two storey roof extension and new mezzanine floor level for use as office floor space (Class B1) at 29-39 Mount Pleasant. The change of use and refurbishment of part of the buildings including  5 Rosebery Avenue to provide a retail unit (Class A1) and 7 no residential dwellings (Class C3) and part demolition and erection of a single storey roof extension off Warner street for residential floor space (Class C3) as well as photovoltaic panels solar thermal panels plant and associated works. Conservation area consent is sought for the demolition works., including external lift core roof lights and plant at roof level at Mount Pleasant and the partial demolition of an existing roof extension off Warner Street. Also full planning application reference P121605 submitted. This application may affect the character and appearance of the conservation area.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); section 73.
decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
